name: VR CHINESE KUNG FU
description:
In the game, players will be incarnated as the most famous mythical hero of the mysterious East - Monkey King. From the perspective of VR, fly through the clouds and travel freely in the scene. Visit and challenge the characters in each immortal to experience the true oriental immortal culture.

Game Features

A fantasy world with pure oriental characteristics - this is a fantasy world with pure oriental characteristics, whether it is scenery, architecture or character modeling, it is a real oriental characteristic

Flying through the clouds, exploring freely—the world of Oriental Xianxia is indispensable, that is, flying. Players can fly freely in the whole world and experience the meaning of "roaming the universe" in oriental culture

Pure fighting, fist to flesh - control Sun Wukong to fight with various masters, and experience the refreshing feeling of fighting in the world of Xianxia. Of course, in fighting, the oriental culture of "pointing to the end" is essential.


Instructions:
attack: Right Hand Trigger
Heavy Attack: Right Hand Left
Thrust Attack: Right Hand Up
Special Attack: Right Hand Right
Parry: Right Hand Grip+Left
Block: Right Hand Down
Jump: Right Hand Grip+Up
Roll: Right Hand Grip+Down
Sprint: Left Hand Grip
Interact: Left Hand Trigger+Right Hand Left
Toggle Targeting: Left Hand Trigger+Right Hand Trigger
Switch Main Hand Type: Left Hand Trigger+Grip+Right Hand Up
Switch Main Hand Item: Left Hand Trigger+Grip+Right Hand Down
Use Tool: Left Hand Trigger+Right Hand Down
Switch Arrows: Left Hand Trigger+Right Hand Up
Quick Switch Soell: Right Hand Grip+Right
